Name: Kogarashi
About the game: Kogarashi tells the story of Abura Akago, a fire demon that lived ignoring the ice demon Yuki Onna and her evil deeds, until one day she went too far and stole the soul of his mother. At that moment Abura Akago armed with his flaming sword decided to free the region from the evil ice spirit and her demon army. Features 3D Hack Nâ€™ Slash combat against several enemy types that will test your skills in different ways. Epic battle against a unique final boss. Two final attacks that will let you execute your enemies or unleash a fiery dragon that will push all foes away. Beautiful frozen medieval Japanese aesthetic style, featuring an original soundtrack. Optional collectibles revealing the lore of the world. About Development This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
